Hwange Colliery Company Limited bụ aha ụlọ ọrụ dị na Zimbabwe na nke na-egwupụta coal, nhazi na ahịa
Ọrụ igwu ala dị nso na Hwange (nke a na-akpọ Wankie ruo n'afọ 1982) na mpaghara Matabeleland North

Isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị na Hwange ma debanye aha ya na isi obodo Harare na ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara na Bulawayo.Edepụtara ngwaahịa ya na Zimbabwe Stock Exchange ma bụrụ akụkụ nke ndepụta ngwaahịa ya, Zimbabwe Mining Index
Edekwara ya na London Stock Exchange na Johannesburg Stock Exchange.
Ụgbọ njem coal bụ n'okporo ụzọ na ụgbọ okporo ígwè
Colliery nwere usoro ụgbọ oloko nke ya
Ebe a na-enyefe aka na NRZ bụ Thomson Junction↵Hwange Colliery Company Limited na-arụ ọrụ nkedo mepere emepe na nke m n'okpuru ala
Obodo Hwange bụ obodo toro eto na-egwupụta kol na mpaghara↵GPS Nhazi 18°23′0.155″S 26°28′12.03″E.
N'afọ 1972, ọdachi na-egwupụta ihe n'ala dakwasịrị ebe a na-egwe ihe n'ime ala nke abụọ na Hwange.
